revised_title: Investigation of Compass Variations on Board the Investigator
tldr: Matthew Flinders, Commander of His Majesty's Ship Investigator, investigates the differences in the magnetic compass readings when the ship's heading changes. He observes that the compass variations are influenced by the ship's direction and offers conjectures on the cause of these differences, which may be related to the ship's ironwork and its position relative to the magnetic equator.
